headline: Assessing Franklin Resources (BEN) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Recent performance snapshot for Franklin Resources Franklin Resources (BEN) has caught investor attention after a recent share price move, with the stock last closing at $28.16 and posting a 1 day return of 1.73% and a 7 day return of 4.30%. Over the past month and past 3 months, the stock shows returns of 9.74% and 22.17%.
